job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: <p>CitiusTech is a leader in HealthCare innovation. We work with over 120 medical technology, provider, payer&nbsp;and life sciences companies across the US. We are rated among top 100 <em>Best Companies to Work For</em> 8 years in a row and consistently&nbsp;achieved the highest NPS in the Industry.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>Data Science team at CitiusTech is helping many of our clients transform customer experience, improve health outcomes and achieve business excellence through the power of AI/ML. We are growing rapidly by 2x year on year. As a team, we are focused on Deep Work in AI / ML as well as building a culture of openness and respect for each other.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Skills : </strong></p><ul><li>AI/ML, cloud, Data Science , Python, R, CAIP, DLVM, Big Query, NLP notebook, Python notebook services, R Notebook services, Data exploration services, Data visualizations, Tableau, Terraform , TensorFlow</li></ul><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Job Description</strong></p><ul><li>Hands-on Cloud experience.</li><li>Experience configuring networking and/or IAM permissions and/or working directly with a networking team</li><li>Experience with deploying models in a production environment, notably a HIPAA or HITRUST environment</li><li>Experience with Cloud AI Platform (CAIP) job development and deploying models with customized pre-processing pipelines and prediction routines</li><li>Experience optimizing ML/AI/Deep Learning models</li><li>Working knowledge on Google Cloud, especially end-to-end machine learning with TensorFlow on GCP, Smart analytics &amp; AI on GCP, Terraform, CAIP, DLVM, Big Query, NLP notebook, Python notebook services, R Notebook services, Data exploration services, Data visualizations, Tableau, RStudio, Speech to text, Text to speech services, IAM permissions configurations etc.</li><li>Experience evaluating and presenting costs($) and tradeoffs of various ML options</li><li>Self-starter with the ability to appropriately prioritize and plan complex work in a rapidly changing environment.</li><li>Strong conceptual and analytical skills, demonstrating outside-the-box problem solving skills, results oriented.</li><li>Team player with experience in leading and collaborating cross-team to ensure successful delivery of solution.</li><li>Work with customers to troubleshoot their technical issues and questions.</li><li>Excellent communication skills - should be able to explain the technical aspects to the business people and relevant stakeholders</li></ul>
